scroll-horizontal.label: Horizontal Scroll (pixels)
scroll-horizontal.tooltip: Enter amount you want clipped from the leftmost portion of the webpage.

scroll-vertical.label: Vertical Scroll (pixels)
scroll-vertical.tooltip: Enter amount you want clipped from the topmost portion of the webpage.

interactive.label: Interactive
interactive.tooltip: Enable to allow users to interact with webpage.

custom-validation.scroll-horizontal: Horizontal Scroll value entered exceeds size of placeholder
custom-validation.scroll-vertical: Vertical Scroll value entered exceeds size of placeholder
